mapper.select: SELECT NAME_KOR, NAME_ENG, PHONE, EMAIL, OFFICE, ABOUT, EDUCATION, PHOTO FROM PROFESSOR ORDER BY PROF_NUMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE PROFESSOR SET NAME_KOR = #{nameKor}, NAME_ENG = #{nameEng}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, OFFICE = #{office}, ABOUT = #{about}, EDUCATION = #{education}, PHOTO = #{photo} WHERE PROF_NUMBER = #{profNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROFESSOR ( PROF_NUMBER, NAME_KOR, NAME_ENG, PHONE, EMAIL, OFFICE, ABOUT, EDUCATION, PHOTO ) VALUES ( #{profNumber}, #{nameKor}, #{nameEng}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{office}, #{about}, #{education}, #{photo} )
